name: Wall Framing
All relevant drawings and revision numbers checked and attached
DPC installed, checked and correct as per specification
Wall locations checked, correct and approved as per latest revised drawing
Fixings and hold down bolts checked and correct
All openings (doors / windows etc) checked, correct and approved
Deflection heads type installed and correct
Wall type checked (straight and plumb) and within tolerance
All relevant nogs (service and special/fixtures) installed, checked and correct
All other nogs checked and approved
Moisture reading checked, recorded and acceptable
All wall framing checks completed & Inspections carried out
Relevant inspections completed and attached
Report sent to client

All relevant drawings and revision numbers checked and attached
Barriers in correct height
Timber size/treatment correct
Joist are installed at correct centres
Solid timber blockings are installed at correct centres
Correct fixings being used
Opening/penetration is correctly constructed
General photos and observation of other timber joist attached
Send report to client

All relevant drawings and revision numbers checked and attached
Plywood thickness / treatment correct
Correct fixings being used – screws / nails
